statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_information;
SELECT id, make, model, registration_details FROM vehicle_information;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_information WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT id, make, model FROM vehicle_information ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, make, model, registration_details FROM vehicle_information WHERE make='Toyota';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_information WHERE model='Civic';
SELECT id, make FROM vehicle_information WHERE registration_details LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT model, make FROM vehicle_information ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_information WHERE make='Ford' AND model='Fiesta';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicles WHERE make='Toyota';
SELECT id, make, registration_number FROM vehicles ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT id, model, registration_number FROM vehicles WHERE make='Honda' ORDER BY registration_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM registrations WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT make, model FROM vehicles WHERE id = 3;
SELECT make, model, registration_number FROM vehicles WHERE registration_number LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT v.make, v.model, r.registration_date FROM vehicles v JOIN registrations r ON v.id = r.vehicle_id WHERE r.expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT v.make, v.model, r.registration_date FROM vehicles v LEFT JOIN registrations r ON v.id = r.vehicle_id WHERE r.id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model, registration_number FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT driver_name, license_number, make FROM drivers JOIN vehicles ON drivers.vehicle_id = vehicles.id;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, service_cost FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT make, model, registration_number FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Honda' OR make = 'Ford';
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY make DESC, model ASC;
SELECT make, model, registration_number FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT v.make, v.model, m.maintenance_type, m.maintenance_date FROM vehicles v JOIN maintenance_logs m ON v.id = m.vehicle_id WHERE m.service_cost > 500;
SELECT d.driver_name, d.license_number, v.make, v.model FROM drivers d JOIN vehicles v ON d.vehicle_id = v.id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles, AVG(service_cost) AS avg_service_cost FROM vehicles RIGHT JOIN maintenance_logs ON vehicles.id = maintenance_logs.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles
SELECT make, model, registration_number FROM Vehicles
SELECT * FROM Drivers WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model FROM Vehicles ORDER BY make DESC
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_date FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Vehicles
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model FROM Vehicles WHERE make='Toyota'
SELECT * FROM Drivers WHERE license_number LIKE 'ABC%'
SELECT v.make, v.model, d.first_name, d.last_name FROM Vehicles v JOIN Assignments a ON v.vehicle_id = a.vehicle_id JOIN Drivers d ON a.driver_id = d.driver_id WHERE a.assignment_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT m.maintenance_type, m.maintenance_date, v.make, v.model, d.first_name, d.last_name FROM Maintenance m JOIN Vehicles v ON m.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN Drivers d ON m.vehicle_id = d.driver_id WHERE m.maintenance_date < '2022-07-01'
SELECT make, model, registration_number FROM vehicles;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE name = 'John';
SELECT assignment_id, driver_id, vehicle_registration_number, assignment_date FROM assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_registration_number, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(fuel_quantity) AS avg_fuel_quantity, SUM(fuel_cost) AS total_fuel_cost FROM fuel_logs;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT model, registration_number FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Honda';
SELECT driver_id, name, phone_number FROM drivers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignments JOIN drivers ON assignments.driver_id = drivers.driver_id;
SELECT vehicle_registration_number, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
